title: Vaccine Projection at WTO in Geneva
cleaned_text: Visit Greenpeace Fund, a nonprofit, 501(c)(3) charitable entity created to increase public awareness and understanding of environmental issues through research, the media and educational programs.

opengraph.title: Vaccine Projection at WTO in Geneva
opengraph.description: Greenpeace Switzerland activists project messages in various languages outside the WTO building in Geneva. The activity, carried out ahead of a WTO meeting, is in solidarity with the movement to temporarily drop the intellectual property rights on the COVID-19 vaccine and other therapeutics by approving the TRIPS waiver (Agreement on Trade-Related Aspects of Intellectual Property Rights ) so countries can make the shot available to as many people as possible.
